uipath.title: UiPath Configuration
uipath.description: Configure your UiPath credentials. These will be used when executing RPA processes.

pat.label: UiPath Personal Access Token (PAT)
pat.placeholder: No PAT found - Enter your UiPath PAT
pat.help: Your PAT will be stored securely.

clientId.label: OAuth Client ID
clientId.help: The Client ID from your UiPath OAuth application

clientSecret.label: OAuth Client Secret
clientSecret.help: The Client Secret will be stored securely and used to obtain access tokens

message.oauthFailed: OAuth credentials saved, but token generation failed. Please check your credentials and UiPath URL.
